short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension help Dropship vendors print ZPL label without ZPL printer, by implementing a ZPL interpreter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool implemented a ZPL interpreter and it is able to print ZPL label with regular printer, so that Dropship vendors can print label directly. Otherwise vendor must buy a Zebra Printer, which will cost them about $500 at least.
